import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Button } from '../../Common/Static' import { RemovePerson } from '../../../Data/Database' export default function RsvpIndividual(props) { function removePerson(person) { props.removePerson(person) } return ( <>

{props.selected.name}

{props.selected.email === '' ? 'NA' : props.selected.email}

{props.selected.response}

) }
